scripts.build: npm run build:webview && npm run build:extension
scripts.watch: npm run watch:webview & npm run watch:extension
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w packages/extension && npm run lint -w packages/webview
scripts.package: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--require $PWD/scripts/patch-os-cpus.cjs" sh -c 'cd packages/extension && vsce package --no-dependencies'
